EmailTemplate.subject: Need more from your technology partner?
EmailTemplate.textOnly: You may not know this, but NCR is more than just a leader in digital banking technology. We power the software, services and hardware systems that help run banks and credit unions. And we have the unique ability to connect all your channels, regardless of core or payments provider. Discover how we can help run your bank or credit union with our integrated approach to digital, banker, branch and ATM technology. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> Â© 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
